TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Dillard, xx-xx-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with N. Dillard, December —, 1827. Price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1731

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with N. Dillard, December —, 1827. Price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* In a/c. with *person_mentioned*N. Dillard*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*To one Beaver Hat---------------------------------------------------------------------- $15.00*/p*
*p*To one Cloak___________________________________________________ 30.00*/p*
*p*To one piece of *location_mentioned*Irish */location_mentioned*linen------------------ 19. 50*/p*
*p*To 3 yds *location_mentioned*Irish */location_mentioned*Sheeting /2/--------------------------------- 6. 00*/p*
*p*To Sugar----------------------- 50.00*/p*
*p*$120. 50*/p*
*p*Error in Linen--------------------- 8. 50*/p*
*p*$129. 00*/p*
*/div1*
